segments.text: I'm looking at a kitchen scene, a simple line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman standing at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing a plate, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't believe what's happening right in front of her!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing, water pouring onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is forming around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is actually standing right in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice this significant mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly alarming to see how oblivious she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out, creating a potential hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she might slip and fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is quickly getting out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor will be completely soaked if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
